subject: RE: A shipment from order #SSN4778 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

I´m writting once again, because i paid 426 euros in the 13/12/2025... it´s almost a month and the only thing that´s its on is way is the pedals haptic reactor for vibration feedback to put in the pedals that i don´t have, but i´ve order in the same purchase. The Shipping as not started yet, and i wonder how can a product takes a all month to get prepared and delivered.

In the same day i bought something to upgrade my setup that went and delivered from USA to Portugal in 6 days...

I just can´t understand what´s happening.

Best regards

Francisco Carneiro

________________________________
De: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>
Enviado: 30 de dezembro de 2025 11:48
Para: frankcisco_rc@msn.com <frankcisco_rc@msn.com>

conversations.body_text:
Hello again,

just to say that when i search the Track & Trace from my order the answer is: " The following waybills have not been collected or have been shipped for more than 3 months: SF6047209218788".

I know that a ticket is made for this purchase but it still says that the only thing that is prepared for shipping is the Haptic Reactor....

I´m waiting the answer.

Francisco Carneiro
________________________________
De: SIMSONN

Hi Francisco carneiro,  Due to the peak season, we have experienced an order backlog, which has caused some delays. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. I’ve already asked our operations team to check the tracking number for your pedals, and we’ll get back to you shortly.

Hi Francisco carneiro,    We apologize for the delay. The shipment is expected to arrive at our German warehouse on the 12th, at which time we will be able to ship your order. We apologize for the inconvenience.
